vision.notes: No information available on vision in this family. Given their burrowing lifestyle, vision may be reduced or absent, but this requires further investigation.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely crucial for detecting substrate vibrations and water currents, important for finding suitable burrowing sites and sensing the environment. This is inferred from other burrowing crustaceans.

chemoreception.notes: Important for identifying suitable substrates for burrowing (e.g., limestone, shells, corals) and locating potential mates. Inferred from other marine invertebrates.
